news_search.title: Jeremy Renner reveals 'last words' to his family after horrific snowplow accident: ‘Just let me go’
news_search.description: Jeremy Renner discusses his near-fatal snowplow accident, revealing how severe his injuries truly were and what he wrote to his family when he thought he was dying.

news_search.title: Jeremy Renner details snowcat accident in first TV interview: 'It's my mistake and I paid for it'
news_search.description: "I'm triggered by the accident. Last night I didn't sleep ... knowing I was going to have to talk about it today," Renner told Sawyer, but says he'd "do it again" and has no regrets. Renner said he refuses for the accident to be a trauma and negative experience.

news_search.title: Jeremy Renner's exclusive interview with Diane Sawyer: The accident, his recovery and more
news_search.description: In "Jeremy Renner: The Diane Sawyer Interview -- A Story of Terror, Survival and Triumph," which aired Thursday, April 6, at 10 p.m. ET on ABC, the "Avengers" star discussed everything from the specifics of the accident to his incredible recovery and the support that's carried him through the ordeal.

news_search.title: Jeremy Renner recounts snow plow accident, says he 'could see my eye with my other eye'
news_search.description: Renner spoke with Diane Sawyer for an ABC special interview after he was crushed by a snow plow on Jan. 1 while trying to save his nephew. The Hawkeye star recounted leaning out the door of the vehicle to see where his nephew was and standing on the track before he fell onto the ground.

news_search.title: Simon Cowell's Harrowing Bike Accident 3 Years Ago Still Has Ramifications When He Heads To AGT For Work
news_search.description: At one point his AGT co-star Howie Mandel showed (comedic) concern by sending him a bicycle with three wheels instead of two in order to putz around town. Americans Varian Fry and Mary Jayne Gold worked with the Emergency Rescue Committee to assist thousands of refugees in Nazi-occupied France during World War II.

news_search.title: Jeremy Renner says he refuses to be 'haunted by' the memory of his accident
news_search.description: "Avengers" star Jeremy Renner talks to Diane Sawyer in his first interview since the accident that almost killed him.

news_search.title: Jeremy Renner Refuses 'To Be Haunted' By Snowplow Accident
news_search.description: Jeremy Renner said he won’t settle for being “haunted” by the New Year’s Day snowplow accident that left him with 30-plus broken bones and nearly killed him.

news_search.title: Detroit police search for suspect in fatal hit-and-run accident
news_search.description: Detroit police are seeking the public's help in finding a driver who struck and killed a man in a March 2023 hit-and-run accident.

news_search.title: How Celtics’ Jaylen Brown cut hand, got 5 stitches after household accident
news_search.description: BOSTON — Jaylen Brown walked into the Celtics locker room pregame Friday with his right hand wrapped and bandaged up. He was a late addition to the injury report with a right hand laceration as the C’s star shed light on what happened to his injured hand.
